short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your ChatGPT conversation with your friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GPTXtend is a toolbox that can enhance the functionality of ChatGPT. 

With GPTXtend, you can easily share your conversations with friends, allowing you to share the transcript with others who may find it useful.

When the user selects the share option, the extension captures the conversation and generates a shareable link that contains the transcript. The user can then share this link with others.
